participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

reshist_addr1_anygsl.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if any type of Good Samaritan law was effective at date of baseline visit (address 1)

reshist_addr1_gsl_arrest.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if Good Samaritan law that provides protection from arrest for controlled substance possession was effective at date of baseline visit (address 1)

reshist_addr2_gsl_arrest.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if Good Samaritan law that provides protection from arrest for controlled substance possession was effective at date of baseline visit (address 2)

reshist_addr3_anygsl.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if any type of Good Samaritan law was effective at date of baseline visit (address 3)

reshist_addr3_gsl_arrest.Description: Residential history derived - indicates if Good Samaritan law that provides protection from arrest for controlled substance possession was effective at date of baseline visit (address 3)
